title: Encore: 'Fiona And The Fairies'
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Selenis Leyva ("Orange is the New Black," "Maniacs") stars as a clever baker in this retelling of a Scottish folktale about the power of a little "please" and "thank you."
itunes:author: WBUR
